00011 template <unsigned D>
00012     class taper_base: public vertex_data<D> {
00013 
00014         public:
00016             taper_base(const vertex_data<D> &v):
00017                 vertex_data<D>(v), _previous_dim(-1), _pre_previous_dim (-1) { }
00018 
00020             void taper(unsigned d);
00021 
00022         private:
00024             bool alreadyTapered() { return _previous_dim >= 0; }
00025 
00027             int _previous_dim;
00029             int _pre_previous_dim;
00030     };

00132 template <unsigned D> void taper_base<D>::taper(unsigned d) {
00133 
00134     if (d >= D) {
00135         throw std::logic_error(
00136             "taper_base::taper() called on a higher dimension than the "
00137             "vector space allows");
00138     }
00139     if (vertex_data<D>::X().size() < 2) {
00140         throw std::logic_error(
00141             "taper_base::taper() can only operate on at least two vertices");
00142     }
00143 
00144     Vector<D> xnew;     //  connect all vertices to this new vertex
00145 
00146     if (!alreadyTapered()) {
00154         for(unsigned i = 0; i < vertex_data<D>::X().size(); ++i) {
00155             xnew += vertex_data<D>::X()[i];
00156         }
00157         xnew *= 1./vertex_data<D>::X().size();
00158 
00160         xnew[d] = sqrt(1.-0.25);
00161     } else {
00166         xnew = vertex_data<D>::X().back();
00167 
00168         if (_pre_previous_dim < 0) {
00174             xnew[d] = sqrt(xnew[_previous_dim]*xnew[_previous_dim]-.25);
00178             xnew[_previous_dim] /= 2.;
00179         } else {
00183             xnew[d] = sqrt(fabs(xnew[_previous_dim]*xnew[_previous_dim]-
00184                     xnew[_pre_previous_dim]*xnew[_pre_previous_dim]));
00185             xnew[_previous_dim] /= 2.;
00186         }
00187     }
00188 
00189     vertex_data<D>::X().push_back(xnew);
00190 
00194     for (unsigned i = 0; i < vertex_data<D>::X().size()-1; i++) {
00195         for (unsigned j = i+1; j < vertex_data<D>::X().size()-1; j++) {
00196             vertex_data<D>::addSurface(i, j, vertex_data<D>::X().size()-1);
00197         }
00198     }
00199 
00200     _pre_previous_dim = _previous_dim;
00201     _previous_dim = d;
00202 
00203     vertex_data<D>::dimension()++;   //  object is now one dimension higher
00204 }
00205 
00206 #endif
